response:
Ipsilateral right oculomotor palsy with ptosis and a dilated pupil, contralateral (left) spastic hemiparesis with hyperreflexia and extensor plantar, contralateral loss of vibration and joint position sense, and contralateral limb ataxia/intention tremor together indicate a single lesion in the right midbrain tegmentum involving the oculomotor fascicles, cerebral peduncle, medial lemniscus and superior cerebellar peduncle/red nucleus.

lesion_locations = ["right midbrain tegmentum"]
